info.title: Preface to the DocBook V5.1 Edition

preface.para: This edition of DocBook Publishers: The Definitive Guide describes the DocBook V5.1 schema, currently version .
If you're using DocBook Publishers V1.0, you will find some things in this online text which are new or different from the OASIS Standard release.
Please see DocBook 5.1: The Definitive Guide for more details.
